Package dev.kkorolyov.pancake.core.component

Class Transform

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.kkorolyov.pancake.core.component.Transform
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.entity.Component
    public class Transform
extends java.lang.Object
implements dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.entity.Component
    Position and orientation of an entity local to a parent transform.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Transform​(dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.math.Vector position)
      Constructs a new transform with orientation 0 rads about all axes.
      Transform​(dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.math.Vector position, Transform parent, boolean rotatesWithParent)
      Constructs a new transform with a parent and orientation 0 rads about all axes.

      Constructs a transform with no parent.

      Constructs a new transform.

      • Transform

        public Transform​(dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.math.Vector position,
                 dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.math.Vector orientation,
                 Transform parent,
                 boolean rotatesWithParent)
        Constructs a new transform.
        Parameters:
        position - initial position
        orientation - vector where each component is the rotation in radians about the respective axis
        parent - parent transform
        rotatesWithParent - true means this transform is effectively "glued" to its position on parent and follows rotational position accordingly

    • Method Detail

      • getPosition

        public dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.math.Vector getPosition()
        Returns:
        position relative to parent transform

      • getGlobalPosition

        public dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.math.Vector getGlobalPosition()
        Returns:
        position relative to the root transform

      • getOrientation

        public dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.math.Vector getOrientation()
        Returns:
        orientation relative to parent

      • getGlobalOrientation

        public dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.math.Vector getGlobalOrientation()
        Returns:
        orientation relative to the nearest ancestor which does not rotatesWithParent

      • setParent

        public Transform setParent​(Transform parent,
                           boolean rotatesWithParent)
        Parameters:
        parent - parent to which this transform's position (and optionally, orientation) are relative to
        rotatesWithParent - true means this transform's orientation is evaluated relative to parent
        Returns:
        this
